data.name: The Bernard Zakheim Murals: History of Medicine in California
data.detailed_description: UC San Francisco is pleased to present this virtual experience for viewing a collection of New Deal-era murals by the Polish-born artist Bernard Zakheim. The collection features a 10-panel mural titled the "History of Medicine," which was carefully removed from a seismically outdated building and placed in safe, climate-controlled storage.
data.about_the_game: UC San Francisco is pleased to present this virtual experience for viewing a collection of New Deal-era murals by the Polish-born artist Bernard Zakheim. The collection features a 10-panel mural titled the "History of Medicine," which was carefully removed from a seismically outdated building and placed in safe, climate-controlled storage.
data.short_description: The Bernard Zakheim Murals: History of Medicine in California features a collection of New Deal-era murals painted by the Polish-born artist Bernard Zakheim which brings to life the history of medicine in California through immersive virtual reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 400 Series or better
